SEARCH

Uses of Package
org.klojang.templates

Packages that use org.klojang.templates
Package
Description
org.klojang.templates
Main package of this module.
org.klojang.templates.name
Various NameMapper implementations for translating names using one naming convention into names using another naming convention.
  • Classes in org.klojang.templates used by org.klojang.templates
    Class
    Description
    Accessor
    Accessors are used to extract values from objects.
    AccessorRegistry
    A registry of accessors.
    AccessorRegistry.Builder
    A builder class for AccessorRegistry instances.
    NameMapper
    Generic name mapping interface.
    ParseErrorCode
    Symbolic constants for syntax errors and other types of errors in a Klojang template.
    ParseException
    Thrown if the template source could not be parsed into a Template.
    PathResolver
    Path resolvers are used by the template parser to load the source code for a template.
    RenderErrorCode
    Symbolic constants for errors that may occur while populating or rendering a template.
    RenderSession
    A RenderSession lets you populate a template and then render it.
    Setting
    Specifies all system properties and/or environment variables that will be picked up by Klojang Templates.
    Stringifier
    A stringifier is responsible for stringifying the values that are inserted into a template.
    StringifierRegistry
    A registry of stringifiers used by the RenderSession to stringify the values coming back from the data access layer.
    StringifierRegistry.Builder
    A builder class for StringifierRegistry instances.
    Template
    The Template class is responsible for loading and parsing templates.
    VarGroup
    Variable groups allow you to group template variables across one or more templates.
    VariableOccurrence
    Represents a concrete occurrence of a variable within a template.
  • Classes in org.klojang.templates used by org.klojang.templates.name
    Class
    Description
    NameMapper
    Generic name mapping interface.
